narrative.narrative: Luftfahrtgesellschaft Walter mbH, commonly abbreviated LGW, is a German regional airline headquartered in Dortmund. Originally an independent provider of scheduled and chartered low-volume passenger flights. After years of cooperation with Air Berlin and becoming a subsidiary hereof in 2017, it has been purchased by Lufthansa in October 2017 for integration into the group's low-cost carrier Eurowings. The acquisition is expected to be closed in January 2018 after receiving approval from the European Commission on 21 December 2017.
